title: Nvidia to invest $5 billion in Intel; companies will work together on AI infrastructure and PCs
description: NEW YORK — Nvidia, the world’s leading chipmaker, announced on Thursday that it’s investing $5 billion in Intel and it will collaborate with the struggling semiconductor company on products. title: Medicare prior authorization pilot program coming to Ohio
description: Artificial intelligence will soon play a role in whether Medicare will pay for Ohioans' pain relief therapy and skin substitute bandages.
content:
The program, called WISeR, aims to reduce wasteful spending and fraud in the Medicare system.
Doctors and Democrats have raised concerns that the pre-approval process could delay or deny necessary patient care.

title: IBM and BharatGen join hands to advance AI adoption in India with Indic Language Models
description: IBM and BharatGen, on Thursday, announced a strategic collaboration to accelerate the adoption of Artificial Intelligence (AI) in India, powered by BharatGen's sovereign multimodal and Large Language Models (LLMs) tailored to the country's linguistic and cultural needs, according to a press release by BharatGen.

title: American Made: Nvidia Bets Big on Intel with $5 Billion Investment to Drive AI and PC Innovation
